definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Wiener reviewed the history of machine automata segueing into human anatomy.
sentences.chinese: 维纳回顾了自动控制机器进入人体解剖学的演变历史。

sentences.english: The key technology of coal slurry floatation automatic control was addressed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了煤泥浮选自动控制的特点和关键技术。

sentences.english: Some failures must be corrected immediately using automatic controls or error proofing.
sentences.chinese: 有些失效必须马上通过自动控制或防错方法予以纠正。

sentences.english: Pre-heating oven. Oil heating for bronzing plate, constant temperature auto control, oil pump circulation.
sentences.chinese: 烫金版油加热，恒温自动控制，油泵循环。

sentences.english: High-pressure fire injection burning system, Automatic temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 高压喷火燃烧系统，温度自动控制。

sentences.english: Automatically controlled heating can finish batched production at one time.
sentences.chinese: 自动控制加热，可一次性完成批量化生产。

sentences.english: The temperature auto-control loop of the de-propane tower is added.
sentences.chinese: 增加脱乙烷塔制冷系统的温度自动控制回路。

sentences.english: In this thesis, an auto-control draft for jigging air-valve based on expert system is researched.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研究了基于专家系统的跳汰机风阀的自动控制。

sentences.english: Some of the oil and chemical industries are built almost entirely around self-acting controls.
sentences.chinese: 石油化学工业的一些生产设施，已经用机器自动控制。

sentences.english: Dept. of Automatic Control of Tsinghua University, the former name of Dept. of Computer Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 清华大学自动控制系，计算机科学与技术系前身。

sentences.english: We writed a PLC program to make the the automatically controlled function come true.
sentences.chinese: 通过编写PLC程序来实现自动控制功能。

sentences.english: The power supply will be convenient for controlling the magnetron sputtering coater automatically.
sentences.chinese: 该电源为磁控溅射镀膜设备实现自动控制提供了方便。

sentences.english: Research of VAV Air-Conditioning System Control Theory.
sentences.chinese: 变风量空调自动控制理论的探讨。

sentences.english: The temperature is automatically controllable in the three-section drying oven respectively.
sentences.chinese: 烘箱分三段加热，温度分别自动控制。

sentences.english: And, it could mean a fleet of delivery vehicles autonomously controlled.
sentences.chinese: 它还意味着可以组建自动控制的运送车队。
